Hi,

I can't find the basic documentation for how I include a 
BeanShellProcessor in an order template. Presumably I add
something like
<newObject name="MyCustomBeanshellProcessor" 
class="org.archive.crawler.processor.BeanShellProcessor">

</newObject>
somwhere in the relevant processor chain. But what next? Does the shell 
text just go in as the body of the <newObject> element?

--
Colin Rosenthal
IT Developer
State and University Library, Aarhus
